mdRecord.dcterms:title: Petersburg, Camp Lee and vicinity / compiled by Childrey Company, Richmond, Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Childrey Company. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 1 map : col. ; 28 x 45 cm. folded into paper covers 16 x 9 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Legend: County roads; Confederate lines; Confederate forts; Federal lines; Federal forts; Confederate occupation; Federal occupation; Between lines. [original]
Contains two text passages, the one on the left describing the siege of Petersburg and the one on the right detailing the construction of Camp Lee, beginning June 9th, 1917. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Copy 1-2: Robert and Virginia Tunstall Trust Fund, 2002/2003, 2011/2012. [original]
